trans-unit.source: Specifies a print controller that displays a document on a screen as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: Specifica un controller di stampa che visualizza un documento in una schermata come una serie di immagini.

trans-unit.source: Typically, to use the print preview feature, you create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> class and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: In genere, per usare la funzionalità di anteprima di stampa, si crea un'istanza di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>e impostare il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>

trans-unit.source: The PreviewPrintController is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classes, though you can use the PreviewPrintController when managing the display of your own print preview window.
trans-unit.target: Viene utilizzato il PreviewPrintController il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>classi, sebbene sia possibile utilizzare il PreviewPrintController quando la gestione della visualizzazione della finestra di anteprima di stampa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>

trans-unit.source: When used with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>, PreviewPrintController sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>, performs the print preview, and sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> back to the original value.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizza un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>, PreviewPrintController imposta il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>dell'oggetto associato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A>per un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>, esegue l'anteprima di stampa e imposta il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>il valore originale.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>che viene visualizzato durante l'anteprima di stampa.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>su un'immagine di una singola pagina.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>metodo la deallocazione.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla stampa, vedere il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>Panoramica dello spazio dei nomi.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Captures the pages of a document as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: Acquisisce le pagine di un documento come una serie di immagini.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> image representation contained in a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo> to implement your own print preview form.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>immagine rappresentazione contenuti in un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo>per implementare il form di anteprima di stampa.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo"></xref> that contains the pages of a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo"> </xref> che contiene le pagine di un <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> come una serie di immagini.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this controller is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il controller viene utilizzato per l'anteprima di stampa.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a page in a print document.
trans-unit.target: Completa la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come visualizzare l'anteprima di una pagina in un documento stampato.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPage is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPage viene chiamato immediatamente dopo il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>Genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, this method is not called.
trans-unit.target: Se viene generata un'eccezione all'interno di un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento di un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, non viene chiamato questo metodo.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>che viene visualizzato durante l'anteprima di stampa.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>su un'immagine di una singola pagina.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPage method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Cancella il metodo OnEndPage di <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>metodo la deallocazione.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> che rappresenta l'anteprima del documento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to preview a page in the print document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene dati relativi alla modalità di anteprima di una pagina nel documento stampato.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a print document.
trans-unit.target: Completa la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come visualizzare l'anteprima di un documento stampato.

trans-unit.source: This method is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato immediatamente dopo <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>Genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Even if an uncaught exception was thrown during the print preview process, OnEndPrint is called.
trans-unit.target: Anche se durante il processo di anteprima di stampa, è stata generata un'eccezione non rilevata, viene chiamato OnEndPrint.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>che viene visualizzato durante l'anteprima di stampa.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>su un'immagine di una singola pagina.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the OnEndPrint method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mentre il metodo OnEndPrint la deallocazione.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> che rappresenta l'anteprima del documento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to preview the print document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene dati relativi alla modalità di anteprima del documento stampato.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a page in a print document.
trans-unit.target: Avvia la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come visualizzare l'anteprima di una pagina in un documento stampato.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPage is called immediately before <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPage viene chiamato immediatamente prima <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>Genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>che viene visualizzato durante l'anteprima di stampa.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the OnStartPage method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>viene chiamato il metodo imposta OnStartPage il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>su un'immagine di una singola pagina.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>metodo la deallocazione.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Anti-aliasing, also known as gray scaling, makes the print preview look better.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Anti-aliasing, noto anche come scalabilità grigio, comportano l'anteprima di stampa di una visualizzazione migliore.

trans-unit.source: However, the use of anti-aliasing can slow down the rendering speed.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, l'utilizzo di anti-aliasing può rallentare la velocità di rendering.

trans-unit.source: For more information about anti-aliasing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'anti-aliasing, vedere il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> che rappresenta l'anteprima del documento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to preview a page in the print document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene dati relativi alla modalità di anteprima di una pagina nel documento stampato.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of this parameter will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizialmente, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> proprietà di questo parametro sarà <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value returned from this method will be used to set this property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore restituito da questo metodo da utilizzare per impostare questa proprietà.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that represents a page from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> che rappresenta una pagina da un <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a print document.
trans-unit.target: Avvia la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come visualizzare l'anteprima di un documento stampato.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint viene chiamato immediatamente dopo <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>Genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: Crea OnStartPrint il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>che viene visualizzato durante l'anteprima di stampa.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: After OnStartPrint is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la chiamata OnStartPrint, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>su un'immagine di una singola pagina.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>metodo la deallocazione.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint verifies that the printer settings are valid.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint verifica che le impostazioni della stampante siano valide.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> che rappresenta l'anteprima del documento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati per la stampa del documento.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: La stampante indicata nella <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> proprietà non esiste.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use anti-aliasing when displaying the print preview.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se usare un anti alias durante la visualizzazione dell'anteprima di stampa.

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliasing, also known as gray scaling, uses several shades of gray around areas of curves and diagonals in text to give the text a smoother appearance.
trans-unit.target: Anti-aliasing, noto anche come grigio il ridimensionamento, utilizza diverse gradazioni di grigio intorno alle curve e diagonali nel testo per ottenere il testo di un aspetto più uniforme.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > While using anti-aliasing makes the print preview look better, it can slow down the rendering speed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Durante l'utilizzo di anti-aliasing comportano una visualizzazione migliore dell'anteprima di stampa, può rallentare la velocità di rendering.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the print preview uses anti-aliasing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'anteprima di stampa Usa anti-aliasing; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
